thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Brazil’s Petrobras Plans to Raise at Least $833 Million From Debt Issue
thread.title_full: Brazil’s Petrobras Plans to Raise at Least $833 Million From Debt Issue - WSJ

author: Rogerio Jelmayer
title: Brazil’s Petrobras Plans to Raise at Least $833 Million From Debt Issue
text:
SÃO PAULO––Brazilian state-run oil firm Petróleo Brasileiro SA is planning to raise at least 3 billion reais (about $833 million) from the issue of local bonds, amid its effort to finance its investment program and also lengthen the maturity of its debt.
Petrobras, as the company is also known, said it would the raise the cash through a debentures issue and that the amount of the operation could be increased by an undisclosed amount...
